languages.text: "Под сводами Дворца Правосудия было казнено немало опаснейших врагов Человечества. Эти стены ничего не забывают..."

traits.locale_text: "Под сводами Дворца Правосудия было казнено немало опаснейших врагов Человечества. Эти стены ничего не забывают..."

languages.text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."
languages.original_text: "Под сводами Дворца Правосудия было казнено немало опаснейших врагов Человечества. Эти стены ничего не забывают..."

traits.locale_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."
"The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."
"The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."
"The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."
"The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

languages.text: "Der Justizpalast hat bereits die Exekution vieler gefährlicher Feinde der Menschheit erlebt. Diese Mauern vergessen nichts ..."
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Justizpalast hat bereits die Exekution vieler gefährlicher Feinde der Menschheit erlebt. Diese Mauern vergessen nichts ..."

languages.text: « Un grand nombre des ennemis les plus dangereux de l'humanité ont été exécutés au palais de justice. Ces murs n'oublient rien... »
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: « Un grand nombre des ennemis les plus dangereux de l'humanité ont été exécutés au palais de justice. Ces murs n'oublient rien... »

languages.text: “许多极其危险的人类之敌，都是在正义大殿里接受处决的。这里的高墙见证了一切……”
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: “许多极其危险的人类之敌，都是在正义大殿里接受处决的。这里的高墙见证了一切……”

languages.text: «Muchos de los enemigos más peligrosos de la Humanidad han sido ejecutados en el Palacio de la Justicia. Estos muros no olvidan...».
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: «Muchos de los enemigos más peligrosos de la Humanidad han sido ejecutados en el Palacio de la Justicia. Estos muros no olvidan...».

languages.text: 「司法宮は、人類の最も危険な敵を数多く処刑してきた。この壁は、決して何も忘れはしない…」
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: 「司法宮は、人類の最も危険な敵を数多く処刑してきた。この壁は、決して何も忘れはしない…」

languages.text: "Adalet Sarayı, İnsanlık'ın en tehlikeli düşmanlarından birçoğunun infazına şahit oldu. Bu duvarlar hiçbir şeyi unutmaz."
languages.original_text: "The Palace of Justice has seen the execution of many of Humanity's most dangerous enemies. These walls forget nothing..."

traits.locale_text: "Adalet Sarayı, İnsanlık'ın en tehlikeli düşmanlarından birçoğunun infazına şahit oldu. Bu duvarlar hiçbir şeyi unutmaz."
